h1. Project Configuration Server Plugin

This plugin shows the basic configuration of the projects on this buildserver, such as project name, category, queue and queue priority, making it easier to spot conflicts in the queue setup for this buildserver.  

h2. Version

Available from version 1.4.0

h2. Examples

{code:xml|borderStyle=solid}
<projectConfigurationServerPlugin />
{code}


h2. Configuration Elements

There is no configuration for this plugin.

h2. Notes

{tip}
This can be installed using the "Server Configuration Display" package.  
{tip}
